Header.title: We are a Landing Page
Header.paragraph: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Duis sed dapibus leo nec ornare diam sed commodo nibh ante facilisis bibendum.

OURJOURNEY.paragraph: Welcome to the official One Piece Live Action website! We are dedicated to bringing the beloved world of One Piece to life through a thrilling live-action adaptation. Our mission is to stay true to the spirit of the original manga and anime while delivering an unforgettable experience for both long-time fans and newcomers alike

DEVILFRUITS.name: Gomu Gomu no Mi
DEVILFRUITS.text: Grants the user the ability to stretch, inflate, and twist their body like rubber, making them immune to physical attacks and bullets.

DEVILFRUITS.name: Gura Gura no Mi
DEVILFRUITS.text: Enables the user to generate powerful shockwaves and create earthquakes, which can devastate landscapes and destroy buildings.

DEVILFRUITS.name: Hie Hie no Mi
DEVILFRUITS.text: Gives the user the power to create, control, and become ice, allowing them to freeze opponents and objects instantly and create ice structures.

DEVILFRUITS.name: Mera Mera no Mi
DEVILFRUITS.text: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into fire, making them capable of launching fire-based attacks and becoming immune to fire

DEVILFRUITS.name: Ope Ope no Mi
DEVILFRUITS.text: Grants the user the ability to create a spherical space or "room" in which they can manipulate the positions and conditions of objects and people, performing miraculous surgeries and attacks.

DEVILFRUITS.name: Bomu Bomu
DEVILFRUITS.text: People who eat this fruit have the ability to turn their body into a bomb and create explosions without being harmed.

ACTORSSAY.text: Death is not a way to repay you, people don't save you for that reason.
ACTORSSAY.name: Luffy

ACTORSSAY.text: Life is like a pencil, it's bound to end. But it will leave great beautiful strokes
ACTORSSAY.name: Nami

ACTORSSAY.text: If I can't protect even the captain's dream, then all my ambitions are empty words! Luffy must be the one who will become the Pirate King!
ACTORSSAY.name: Zoro

ACTORSSAY.text: Real men are always ready to forgive women's LIES
ACTORSSAY.name: Sanji

ACTORSSAY.text: A man has to fight when the dreams of his comrades are laughed at
ACTORSSAY.name: Usopp

ACTORSSAY.text: I have to be stronger, otherwise I won't be able to protect anyone
ACTORSSAY.name: Luffy

FACTORPOINTS.title: Acting
FACTORPOINTS.text: An image of a character acting with distinct costume and clear facial expressions, such as Luffy with his straw hat and characteristic smile.

FACTORPOINTS.title: Design
FACTORPOINTS.text: An image of a detailed pirate ship, including elements like masts, pirate flags, and a character in complex pirate attire.

FACTORPOINTS.title: Effects
FACTORPOINTS.text: An image of a battle scene with special effects like fire, sparks, and dynamic character actions, such as Zoro wielding a glowing sword.

FACTORPOINTS.title: Plot
FACTORPOINTS.text: An image of a book with the One Piece logo on the cover, next to a film reel to represent the adaptation from manga/anime to live-action.
